title: BBC Local Live: Northamptonshire for Thursday 23 July 2015 - BBC News
summary: northants police officer adrian goldsmith pleads not guilty to murdering his wife jill .
northampton hospital chief executive says the last year has been 'dominated by the most sustained period of urgent care we have ever experienced ' .
murder accused danny beaumont stabbed his friend stephen smith in the chest and back , northampton crown court hears .
more news , sport travel and weather from 08:00 on friday .

documents.title: have a good evening
text: thanks for joining us again .
i 'm afraid we 've come to the end of another round-up of the days news , sport , leisure and weather .
our main story today has been the news that chief executive dr sonia swart has said `` unprecedented levels of high demand '' at northampton hospital had increased the risk to patient safety .
we 'll be back tomorrow from 08:00 - hopefully you can join us then .
author: Craig Lewis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: northampton general hospital 'improving '
text: chief executive of northampton general hospital , dr sonia swart , has been speaking about the annual report which says the hospital is experiencing `` unprecedented levels of high demand '' .

documents.title: northampton 's hospital 'doing its best '
text: northamptonshire 's patient watchdog has said northampton general hospital 's

chief executive of healthwatch northamptonshire , rosie newbigging told me the report , `` is telling a of a hospital under intense and sustained pressure trying to do its best under very challenging circumstances '' .
author: Mike Cartwright
BBC Look East

documents.title: supermarket fined £ 1,500 for sign
text: a supermarket in brackley town centre has been fined £ 1,500 after displaying an illuminated sign in a conservation area without advertisement consent .
in late 2014 the co-op in burgess square put up an illuminated fascia prior to receiving a decision on their advertisement consent application .
the council decided the fascia was unacceptable given its sensitive location due to its length , depth , design , colour , and the materials used .
the erection of such advertisements is a criminal offence , and so the council chose to prosecute the co-op , which pleaded guilty and was fined £ 1,500 plus costs .
author: Pete Cooper
Northamptonshire Live

documents.title: hospital should 'run things efficiently '
text: the conservative northampton north mp michael ellis has been praising the staff of northamptonshire general hospital describing them as `` dedicated and committed '' , with its chief executive dr sonia swart sent to present the
however , mr ellis said there was room for improvement .
he said : `` we have to make sure savings are made , to divert resources to the front line .
we need to run things efficiently and make savings for the taxpayer where we can , while investing a great deal more money into northampton general hospital . ''
author: BBC Look East

documents.title: lib dems pressure for towcester bypass
text: liberal democrat councillors initiated a full debate at south northamptonshire council yesterday in their
author: About My Area NN12

documents.title: northampton hospital finishes year in debt
text: we 've been talking about northampton hospital today ahead of its annual general meeting this evening and a warning in its

dr swart said the hospital has faced the `` most sustained period of urgent care we have ever experienced '' over the last year - but the report also says the trust ended the financial year in deficit .
she said : `` caring for higher numbers of patients with increasingly complex medical and nursing needs presents enormous challenges . ''
author: Craig Lewis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: travel : m1 southbound blocked
text: the m1 southbound is blocked and traffic is stationary
all traffic is being held while the vehicles are being recovered and emergency services attend .
most of the vehicles are on the hard shoulder .
traffic is also slow northbound in the area .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: girlfriend tells trial , 'i was screaming '
text: the trial of danny beaumont , who denies murdering his friend steven smith in rushden last october , has continued at northampton crown court .
the court heard from the victim 's girlfriend , ainsley douglas , who says she saw mr smith being stabbed .
she said when she went to get a charger for her phone to call an ambulance , she saw mr beaumont attack her boyfriend for a second time .
she said : `` i helped steven to the front door to get help .
steven collapsed on the stairs .
at the bottom of the stairs i said [ to mr beaumont ] 'you need to ring an ambulance ' , but he walked off .
i was screaming . ''
the court heard a neighbour then called an ambulance .
the trial continues .
author: Elinor Cross
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: murder trial told defendant 'looked angry '
text: some more witness accounts have been heard at northampton crown court , in the trial of a man accused of stabbing his 23-year-old friend to death in the trafford road area of rushden .
the court has heard from the girlfriend of victim steven smith , ainsley douglas .
she said defendant danny beaumont `` looked angry '' .
`` i panicked and asked for his phone to phone an ambulance , '' she said .
`` my phone was dead , i told [ mr beaumont ] give me your phone so that i can phone an ambulance .
he said 'no ' . ''
prosecutors asked , `` did he hand the phone over to you ? ''
she replied `` no '' .
author: Elinor Cross
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: state-of-the-art rail academy
text: i 've been to see the new multimillion-pound state-of-the-art academy to train people for the uk rail industry .
it 's being located at the site of siemens ' existing train depot and uk service headquarters in kings heath , northampton .
the centre will act as a national hub with regional 'spokes ' located around the country .
it 's hoping to take its first students this year .
author: Stuart Ratcliffe
BBC Look East

documents.title: 'wine bottles smashed during fight ' , murder trial hears
text: i 'm at northampton crown court for the trial of 27-year-old danny beaumont , who denies murdering his friend steven smith , 23 .
the court is hearing from the victim 's girlfriend ainsley douglas .
she told prosecutors : `` steven and daniel were fighting .
wine bottles smashed on the kitchen floor .
i tried to split them up by pulling them apart . ''
asked if she succeeded , she said `` no '' .
author: Elinor Cross
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: trial of man accused of stabbing friend to death resumes
text: the trial of a man accused of stabbing his 23-year-old friend to death in rushden has resumed at northampton crown court .
steven smith died after being stabbed twice in rushden .
danny beaumont , 27 , was charged with murder .
today the court heard from the victims 's girlfriend , ainsley douglas .
she told the court she came down the stairs to find her boyfriend had been stabbed in the chest .
when she went to call an ambulance she said the defendant , mr beaumont , stabbed her boyfriend a second time in the back
author: Elinor Cross
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: appeal after corby mugging
text: officers investigating an alleged mugging in corby have
unfortunately , he left before police arrived and has not been traced since .
he was white , about 15 or 16 and was wearing a red and white checked shirt and tracksuit bottoms .
he told bar staff his attacker was a black man who was in his 30s , about 6ft , and was wearing a blue hooded top and dark tracksuit bottoms .
he was last seen walking towards studfall avenue in the direction of rowlett road .
author: Pete Cooper
Northamptonshire Live

documents.title: green flag awards for northamptonshire
text: this year 's award winners have been unveiled as part of the green flag award scheme .
a green flag is considered the mark of a quality park or green space .

several northamptonshire parks have received the gong including pitsford water , abington park , delapre abbey , daventry country park , hall park in rushden ( and hazel and thoroughsale woods in corby .
mill park reserve in long buckby has received a green flag community award .
you can search for a green flag park on
author: Pete Cooper
Northamptonshire Live

documents.title: northants captain confident despite loss
text: northamptonshire 's hopes for a place in the quarter-final of the t20 blast will go to the final group game , after they
the hosts set a target of 155 for victory , but northants fell one run short , despite a late rally that included 29 runs in 11 balls from rory kleinveldt .
it means the steelbacks must beat durham on friday to guarantee their passage to the last eight .
captain alex wakely told me : `` we got this game close from nowhere , but we 'll win that game [ against durham ] .
we want that quarter-final more than anyone . ''
author: Joe Townsend
BBC Radio Northampton sport

documents.title: holcot woman accepts field proposal
text: a farmer from milton keynes has proposed to his girlfriend by flying her over a wheat field where he 'd carved the words `` will you marry me '' .
rick davies , 32 , did it by spraying pesticide from a quad bike as he rode through the field .
his girlfriend said yes .
he met 33-year-old diana cull , from holcot , two and a half years ago at a dinner party and they plan to marry in july next year .
unsurprisingly the story has attracted
author: Pete Cooper
Northamptonshire Live

documents.title: pc adrian goldsmith not guilty plea
text: northamptonshire police officer adrian goldsmith , appearing at northampton crown court over video link , has pleaded not guilty to murdering his wife jill goldsmith .
pc goldsmith , 49 and known as 'otis , ' was arrested in march at his home in wootton hall park , northampton .
mrs goldsmith died of head injuries .
the case will next come before the court in august .
author: Elinor Cross
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: breakingpolice officer pleads not guilty to wife murder
text: northamptonshire police officer adrian goldsmith has pleaded not guilty at northampton crown court to murdering his wife jill .

documents.title: cardboard cut-out copper retires
text: you might not know pc peter littleton unless you live in the wellingborough area , but you would have seen his face across northamptonshire as cardboard cut-outs of him are used in shops , police stations and community buildings around the county to deter criminals .
he 's now retired after 30 years of service .
author: Pete Cooper
Northamptonshire Live

documents.title: murder trial continues
text: the trial of a man accused of stabbing another man to death in rushden is set to continue at northampton crown court today .
danny beaumont , 26 , denies stabbing stephen smith to death in the trafford road area of the town in october .
yesterday , the court heard how mr beaumont told police the pair had been drinking together and had a row .

the prosecutor told the court mr smith had been stabbed in the back and that the defendant wielded the knife in a way that meant he wanted to kill the victim or at least cause him serious bodily harm .
author: Elinor Cross
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: northampton hospital faced 'most sustained period of urgent care ever '
text: northampton hospital nhs trust 's chief executive is set to tell board members that the last year has been `` dominated by the most sustained period of urgent care we have ever experienced '' .
dr sonia swart will speak at the hospital 's annual general meeting from 17:00 .

documents.title: more beekeeping apprentices needed
text: it 's essential more young people get involved in commercial bee farming if britain is to be able to feed itself in the future .
that 's the warning from the industry , which says the average age of a bee keeper is 66 .
i 've been to brackley bees , on the edge of charlton village in south northamptonshire .
they have more than 800 hives and lara manton is an apprentice beekeeper there .
she told me : `` you know from that moment you open a beehive , whether you run away screaming , or stand there staring fascinated , whether you will love it or not . ''
you can see
author: Tom Percival
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: northants miss out by one run
text: northamptonshire missed out on confirming their place in the t20 blast quarter-finals by the narrowest of margins ,
the hosts , set a target of 155 for victory , were well off the pace until rory kleinveldt got them down to needing 23 from the final over .
the south african all-rounder hit the first two balls for six .
captain alex wakely needed a four to win off the final ball , but in the end could only get two .
they 'll now have to win on friday night against durham in the final group game to be sure of progression to the last eight .
author: Graham McKechnie
BBC Radio Northampton sport

documents.title: greater fire controls for recycling plants
text: following more than 40 fires at recycling centres in five years , the fire service has joined calls for tighter legislation and planning controls for recycling plants .
i 've been to gretton brook road in corby at the site of a recycling plant where a
at its height 80 firefighters were brought in to fight the blaze and one fire appliance remains here .

councillor andre gonzalez de savage , who has responsibility for northamptonshire fire and rescue service , said : `` i would like to see greater systems in place to prevent these rather large fires taking place . ''
author: Tom Percival
BBC Radio Northampton
